titleStmt.title: Information for James Mclurg late dean of Guild of Edinburgh, George Clerk, Robert Blackwood and others, merchants and tradesmen of Edinburgh against Sir John Hall, Sir Archibald Muir, and others the present magistrates and council thereof.

notesStmt.note: Date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Imperfect: print show-through with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Sutro Library.
